title: Bug 130068 [Regression] Report Parameter window doesn't pop up when preview a report with parameter.
description: Report Parameter window doesn't pop up when preview a report with parameter.
OB: When attempting to preview a report with parameters, the Report Parameter window does not pop up.
EB: When you click 'Preview' in the report layout, the expected result is that a window should pop up for inputting parameter values. The actual result is that some required parameter values are not set or are set to incompatible data types.
SR:
To reproduce the bug:
1. Open the report in the software.
2. Click on 'Preview' in the report layout.
